Original:
great place pero poco caro.
今天遇到兩位店員都很有經驗，對於酒的介紹都可以從龍舌蘭品種到陳釀到氣味介紹了很多，而且倒酒真的倒足倒滿不會水水的。

店員也很好聊天！
唯一可惜是chiapas是預先調好的，感覺沒有看到現場調酒表演，
DJ播音樂很特別但我不覺得有額外加分效果。
酒單很特別，很多意想不到的配方，而且不定期更新酒譜。
最特別是他們有用祕魯聖木淨化空氣，幫店員跟我們薰香！！！
內用消費限制2hr/至少800 Ntd. 有小包廂。

坐在吧台結果連續被漏單兩次。
第一次就算了，第二次怪系統有問題；後來反應後也沒有馬上處理，調酒師還在跟其他客人聊天。中間調酒師洗杯子，我們還被水噴到，女生調酒師就只說了一句對不起。

The result of sitting on the bar was continuously missed twice.

Original:
有別於一般酒吧所提供的調酒，以mezcal作為基底、辛香料創造出不同的驚喜與層次口感，每一口都充滿濃郁的墨西哥文化。環境跟氛圍也很棒，Bartender 對於墨西哥調酒很有研究，從聊天當中了解每一杯酒背後的故事、原料，讓你對墨西哥擁有更多的想像空間！如果你對於酒吧如出一轍的酒單及口感已經逐漸感到了無新意，非常推薦來Uno找bartender - Casper切磋一下墨西哥迷幻風味。

#台北酒吧
EN:
Different from the bartending provided by the general bar, MEZCAL is based on the base and spices to create different surprises and hierarchical tastes, and each bite is full of strong Mexican culture.The environment and the atmosphere are also great. Bartender has studied Mexico bartending. From the chat, you can understand the story and raw materials behind each glass of wine, so that you have more imagination of Mexico!If you have gradually felt the same as the wine list and taste of the bar, it is recommended to find UNO to find Bartender -Casper to learn about Mexico's psychedelic flavor.

#Taipei Bar

Original:
很棒的飲料。音樂有點太大聲，但我肯定會回來喝酒。我喝了“清爽”部分的葡萄柚雞尾酒和“熱帶部分”的覆盆子雞尾酒。兩者都非常清爽，味道也很棒。我不喜歡梅斯卡爾/威士忌/龍舌蘭酒，所以這兩種飲料非常適合我（杜松子酒/白蘭地）。
10/10
EN:
A great drink.The music is a bit loud, but I will definitely come back to drink.I drank the "refreshing" part of the grapefruit cocktail and the raspberry cocktail of the "tropical part".Both are very refreshing and the taste is great.I don't like Meescal/whiskey/agave, so these two drinks are very suitable for me (Du Songzi wine/Bailan land).
10/10

Original: 我是因為社交媒體上彈出的玉米餅廣告而發現這個地方的。我們去那裡吃炸玉米餅，太糟糕了，我不會推薦它們。不過酒吧本身真的很不錯。裝飾非常美觀，工作人員非常友好和樂於助人。雞尾酒菜單很有趣，雞尾酒也很不錯。
EN: I discovered this place because of the corn cake advertisements popped on social media.We went there to eat fried corn cakes, which was too bad, I would not recommend them.But the bar itself is really good.The decoration is very beautiful, and the staff is very friendly and helpful.The cocktail menu is very interesting, and cocktails are also very good.

Original: 台灣唯一梅斯卡爾酒吧，對於那些尋找墨西哥主題雞尾酒吧的人來說是必去之處。  而且位置非常靠近台北 101 和夜市，因此是該地區遊客的好去處。 100%推薦！
EN: The only Meescar bar in Taiwan is a must for those who look for the Mexican theme cocktail bar.And the location is very close to Taipei 101 and night markets, so it is a good place for tourists in the area.100%recommendation!

Original: 隱藏在 101 附近熱門區域的漂亮小寶石！獨特的飲料和有趣的主題，讓朋友們在美好的氛圍中閒逛！
EN: Beautiful little gems hidden near the popular areas near 101!Unique drinks and interesting themes, let friends hang out in a beautiful atmosphere!

Original: 第一次來訪。  位置不錯，工作人員超級友好。  菜單和組合非常特別，到目前為止非常令人耳目一新。  台北需要更多這樣的東西。  因為他們的新菜單仍在增加，但目前主要是一家酒吧，所以暫時不要來吃東西，但請睜大眼睛，因為調酒師告訴我食物稍後會來
EN: The first visit.The location is good, and the staff is super friendly.The menu and combination are very special, so far very refreshing.Taipei needs more such things.Because their new menu is still increasing, it is mainly a bar, so don't come to eat for the time being, but please open your eyes, because the bartender tells me that the food will come later.

Original:
雞尾酒很棒，工作人員很棒。

在 DJ 到來之前，氣氛真的很棒。它從一次非常愉快的美酒體驗變成了一個更喧鬧的派對環境，不幸的是，感覺與場地完全不匹配。

會回來喝美味的飲料，但希望不是在派對之夜。
EN:
The cocktail is great, and the staff is great.

Before DJ arrived, the atmosphere was great.It has changed from a very pleasant wine experience to a more noisy party environment. Unfortunately, it feels that it does not match the venue.

I will come back to drink delicious drinks, but I hope it is not the night of the party.
